translation.en: Okay, fine. You know what? I'm slightly intrigued now anyway.

translation.en: It's just, uh, Jerry and I had dinner last night,

translation.en: and I hadn't seen him in months, and then he drove me home, back to my apartment.

translation.en: -That's the fucked-up story? -Yeah. It's nothing.

translation.en: Okay. [laughs]

translation.en: and two of them don't have a pot to piss in.

translation.en: like, six months before, and I just--

translation.ja: 彼も失恋で傷ついてただから…

translation.en: -Yes. Because he was depressed? -Yeah. You blew him to make him feel better?
translation.ja: 落ち込んでた彼を元気づけるためにした？

translation.en: -you're probably related to me. -Oh, God.

translation.en: -Right. -Different years, of course.
translation.ja: そうね 年は違うけど

translation.en: Right.

translation.en: Well, happy birthday.

translation.ja: それで もっと世の中に関わるべきだと思った

translation.ja: オライオン

translation.en: Like the constellation. I love that.
translation.ja: オリオン座が由来？　すてき

translation.en: [exhales] Yeah. No. Like the greatest hunter in Greek mythology.
translation.ja: いいえ　ギリシャ神話の巨人の猟師よ

translation.en: -[exhales] -Are you okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: [breathing heavily] Yes. I just--
translation.ja: ええ ちょっと…

translation.en: I'm realizing I need to get back to my son now.
translation.ja: 息子のところに戻らないと

translation.en: Okay. Uh, what's going on?
translation.ja: 分かったけど どうしたの？

translation.en: Are you having a heart attack?
translation.ja: 心臓発作？

translation.en: God, I'm 46, not 96.
translation.ja: まだ46歳よ96歳じゃあるまいし

translation.en: I'm having a panic attack.
translation.ja: パニック発作

translation.en: [breathing heavily] Hi, honey.
translation.ja: ただいま

translation.en: Hi. I missed you. Are you okay? [kisses] Are you okay?
translation.ja: 会いたかったわ大丈夫？　何ともない？

translation.en: I'm fine. Why shouldn't I be?
translation.ja: 平気だよ　何で聞くの？

translation.en: I just--I had a bad feeling.
translation.ja: ちょっと嫌な予感がして

translation.en: -Why? -I don't know. I just--You know.
translation.ja: 何で？ 分からないけど何となく

translation.en: What are you working on?
translation.ja: それは？

translation.en: Orion. Come on. You're gonna be late for karate.
translation.ja: オライオン　空手に遅れるよ

translation.en: -Coming. -Hi, Maria.
translation.ja: 今 行く マリア

translation.en: -Bye. -Have fun, honey.
translation.ja: じゃあ 楽しんで

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: I wish he was that excited about schoolwork.
translation.ja: 勉強も あれくらい熱心だったらな

translation.en: So, how was the interview?
translation.ja: それで 面接はどうだった？

translation.en: [exhales] First, can I just say thank you
translation.ja: まず お礼を言わせて

translation.en: for being the most amazing husband and father.
translation.ja: あなたは すばらしい夫ですばらしい父親

translation.en: You're the best.
translation.ja: 最高よ

translation.en: You're the best.
translation.ja: 君こそ

translation.en: And I-- I didn't actually, um-- I didn't end up going, so…
translation.ja: それから 結論を言えば受からなかった

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: You know, I-- I felt overqualified actually.
translation.ja: 私には役不足な気がして

translation.en: That's okay, because I want you to be happy.
translation.ja: 構わないよ君の幸せが大事だ

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Right?
translation.ja: だろ

translation.en: I want Orion to get to know
translation.ja: オライオンにも知ってほしい

translation.en: the wonderful, independent woman I fell in love with.
translation.ja: オライオンにも知ってほしい 僕がホレたのは自立したすてきな女性だって

translation.en: Okay. Thank you for that.
translation.ja: それは ありがとう

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Did you ever think, though,
translation.ja: こう考えたことは？

translation.en: what if this wonderful, independent woman you fell in love with didn't want carrot?
translation.ja: その自立したすてきな女性はニンジンが好きだろうかって

translation.en: Carrot.
translation.ja: ニンジン？

translation.en: Carrot cake? For her birthday.
translation.ja: 誕生日のニンジンケーキ

translation.en: Oh. Uh, carrot.
translation.ja: ニンジンか

translation.en: I thought-- I thought carrot was your favorite. Am I--Did I get that wrong?
translation.ja: 君はニンジンが好きかと思って　違った？

translation.en: I haven't touched gluten in months, Will.
translation.ja: 数ヵ月グルテンを断ってた

translation.en: Not that you would notice, you know.
translation.ja: 気づかないのはいい

translation.en: I mean, you don't-- you don't ask me anything.
translation.ja: でもあなたは私に何も尋ねない

translation.en: You don't-- You just assume, you know.
translation.ja: 決めてかかってる

translation.en: I mean, that's really--That's what's wrong with this relationship.
translation.ja: それが私たち夫婦の問題点よ

translation.en: Uh, I wish that were the only thing.
translation.ja: それだけだと よかった

translation.en: What? The only thing that's wrong? Will.
translation.ja: それだけって？　ウィル？

translation.en: -No. -Sorry. What are you saying?
translation.ja: いや どういう意味？

translation.en: Um, Yasmin,
translation.ja: ヤスミン

translation.en: you--you come home in a whirlwind of panic,
translation.ja: 君はパニック状態で帰宅して

translation.en: and it scares Orion sometimes.
translation.ja: 時に 息子を怖がらせる

translation.en: Now you're telling me I scare my own child,
translation.ja: 私が我が子を怖がらせてる？

translation.en: which is, like, basically the worst thing you could ever say to me.
translation.ja: それを私に言うなんて何よりひどい

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, all I'm saying is that sometimes it's too hard.
translation.ja: それを私に言うなんて何よりひどい 僕が言いたいのは時々 大変ってこと

translation.en: Too hard to what? Hard to love me?
translation.ja: 何が？　私を愛するのが？

translation.en: Oh, my God, Will.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ ウィル

translation.en: [in French] Repeat after me, Albert. "The house is small."
translation.ja: 〈繰り返して アルベール“家は小さい”〉

translation.en: -Yes? -[Martin] Are you with Albert right now?
translation.ja: 〈はい〉 〈アルベールは一緒？〉

translation.en: Yes, I've just picked him up.
translation.ja: 〈今 乗せたとこ〉

translation.en: Take me off the speaker, please.
translation.ja: 〈スピーカーをオフに〉

translation.en: -So, they've celebrated… -Wait, wait.
translation.ja: 〈学校でお祝いが…〉 〈待って〉

translation.en: -Yes? -They've celebrated the New Year
translation.ja: 〈どうぞ〉 〈新年のお祝いにもらったお菓子は〉

translation.en: in school and they gave them candy. He can't have any at all.
translation.ja: 〈新年のお祝いにもらったお菓子は〉 〈食べさせるな〉

translation.en: But it's just a few. They're organic.
translation.ja: 〈少量だしオーガニックよ〉

translation.en: I don't give a damn about their belated New Year's party.
translation.ja: 〈祝うこと自体はどうでもいい〉

translation.en: Halloween, Valetine's Day, they always have excuses to get them hooked on sugar.
translation.ja: 〈イベントをいいことに砂糖中毒にさせる気だ〉

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, okay, okay. So… Hello?
translation.ja: 〈分かった〉 〈それじゃ…〉

translation.en: [in English] Why is Daddy always so angry at you?
translation.ja: 何でパパはママに怒るの？

translation.en: He's not angry at me, sweetie. He's angry at sugar.
translation.ja: 私じゃなくて砂糖に怒ってる

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: 何で？

translation.en: Because sugar's very bad for you, sweetie. I mean, you can end up with diabetes.
translation.ja: 体に悪いからよ糖尿病になるかもしれない

translation.en: What does diabetes do to you?
translation.ja: どう悪いの？

translation.en: It can make you very sick and have-- Your toes can fall out.
translation.ja: 重症化すれば足の指を切断する

translation.en: Isn't that leprosy?
translation.ja: それ ハンセン病では？

translation.en: -Okay, just give me the candy. -But, Mom--
translation.ja: 〝食べ物をください〞 お菓子を渡して でも…

translation.en: Albert, just give me the two bags. Diabetes makes your toes fall off, too.
translation.ja: 渡しなさい糖尿病でも指を切断する

translation.en: Fine. Fine.
translation.ja: 分かったよ

translation.en: Sir. Hi. Happy New Year.
translation.ja: こんにちは 新年おめでとうオーガニックよ

translation.en: They're organic.
translation.ja: 新年おめでとうオーガニックよ

translation.en: The world is fucked.
translation.ja: 世界はクソだ

translation.en: Is the world really fucked, Mom?
translation.ja: 世界はクソなの？

translation.en: No. I mean, it's--I mean, yes, it is.
translation.ja: そうかもしれないわね

translation.en: No, it's not. It's not. Not for us.
translation.ja: いいえ私たちにとっては違う

translation.en: Why not for us?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: Well, because we're the happy ones, lucky ones that live together as a family
translation.ja: 私たちには家族がいて幸せで運がいいからよ

translation.en: and we eat healthy food every day, you know.
translation.ja: 健康的な食事だってできてる

translation.en: The poor homeless, they don't have a kitchen. They can't cook.
translation.ja: ホームレスはキッチンもなく料理できない

translation.en: Well, that's why we're gonna distribute meals at a homeless shelter next month.
translation.ja: だから来月 シェルターで食べ物を配る

translation.en: The school says that we need to be agents of change in the world.
translation.ja: 学校で言われた変化を起こせって

translation.en: Isn't that a bit dangerous for a school trip?
translation.ja: 学校の行事なのに危険では？

translation.en: I mean, homeless people are crazy now.
translation.ja: ホームレスの人はおかしいもの

translation.en: I mean, they're angry, not crazy.
translation.ja: おかしくはない怒りを感じてる

translation.en: They're angry. I mean, this one was angry and crazy.
translation.ja: おかしくはない怒りを感じてる さっきの人も怒ってた

translation.en: Mom, please make sure you don't say that in front of anyone at my school.
translation.ja: 学校のみんなの前では今の話 しないでね

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Oh. Next week at school, we're gonna practice for the drill,
translation.ja: 来週は学校で訓練があるよ

translation.en: so you know what to do in case there's an earthquake, fire, a human-made emergency.
translation.ja: 地震や火事 人災が起きた時どうすべきか学ぶ

translation.en: What's that?
translation.ja: 人災って？

translation.en: You know. Like… [imitating gunshots]
translation.ja: そうだな　例えば…

translation.en: Okay. Stop, stop, stop. Get--Just eat candy.
translation.ja: 分かった　やめて 食べていい

translation.en: Just--Just don't tell your dad.
translation.ja: パパには内緒

translation.en: Just eat the-the-the chocolate ones.
translation.ja: チョコレートだけね

translation.en: Thank you, Mom.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Mom, do you think if John Lennon had not been shot,
translation.ja: ジョン･レノンが撃たれなければ

translation.en: the world would be a better place?
translation.ja: 世界はもっとよかった？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.ja: たぶんね

translation.en: I think it would.
translation.ja: 僕はそう思う

translation.en: My tags say, "Made in L.A. fair and safe."
translation.ja: タグの内容はこう“ＬＡ製 公正で安全”

translation.en: Okay, I cannot have children making children's clothes.
translation.ja: 子供に子供服作りは頼めない

translation.en: Should I put, "Made for children by children" on the label?
translation.ja: タグに“子供が作った子供服”とでも書く？

translation.en: Catchy. But she's over 20.
translation.ja: キャッチーねでも彼女は20歳以上

translation.en: Is she?
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: See?
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: -She's 28? -Mm-hmm.
Well, I really can't even tell if it's her.
translation.ja: 彼女に似てない

translation.en: I'm sure it's a bad picture.
translation.ja: 写真がよくない

translation.en: It's fine. It's totally fine. Totally fine.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　問題ない

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Hey, Yas. Can I call you back?
translation.ja: ヤスミン かけ直すわ

translation.en: -I think Will might be leaving me. -What?
translation.ja: ウィルに捨てられる

translation.en: What am I supposed to do? Rent an apartment?
translation.ja: 何？ 部屋を借りるべき？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: No one wants a terrorist in their building.
translation.ja: テロリストじゃ無理ね

translation.en: -What? -Everyone knows all Muslims are terrorists.
translation.ja: ムスリムはみんなそうだと思われる

translation.en: Oh, honey.
translation.ja: ヤスミン

translation.en: I don't even have any money of my own.
translation.ja: 自分のお金もない

translation.en: I just--You know what?
translation.ja: 私って…

translation.en: I'm just-- I'm gonna go walk to the ocean.
translation.ja: ちょっと海へ行く

translation.en: Just be at the beach, be in nature.
translation.ja: ビーチとか自然の中とか

translation.en: I don't know. Something bigger than all of this shit.
translation.ja: 何か大きいものがいい

translation.en: I'll come--I'll come-- I'll come meet you, okay? Wait.
translation.ja: 会いに行くから待ってて

translation.en: I can't live like this anymore.
translation.ja: こんな人生 もうイヤ

translation.en: Yasmin?
translation.ja: ヤスミン？

translation.en: I can't live like this anymore.
translation.ja: こんな人生 もうイヤ

translation.en: What do you mean? You have so much to live for.
translation.ja: 生きがいならいくらだってある

translation.en: It's too late.
translation.ja: もう手遅れなの

translation.en: Too late? You're 30 years old.
translation.ja: 手遅れ？　まだ30歳でしょ
27歳よ

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.ja: そうだった

translation.en: No, but, I mean, I just-- I feel like something really bad is gonna happen.
translation.ja: だけどすごく悪いことが起こる気がして

translation.en: Like, in the world.
translation.ja: 世界にね

translation.en: Honey, you're beautiful. You're smart.
translation.ja: ねえ あなたは美人で賢くてぶっ飛んでる

translation.en: You're fucked up. You're gonna be fine.
translation.ja: あなたは美人で賢くてぶっ飛んでる 大丈夫よ

translation.en: I swear.
translation.ja: 誓ってもいい

translation.en: -You don't even know me. -I know, but I like you already.
translation.ja: 知らないでしょ でも分かる

translation.en: Guys. Guys.
translation.ja: あなたたち

translation.en: -Guys! -What?
translation.ja: ねえ 何？

translation.en: I just made out with this guy, and I think that he was toothless.
translation.ja: 男とイチャついてたらね彼 歯がなかった

translation.en: -[laughing] -What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: He had no teeth.
translation.ja: 彼… 歯がない

translation.en: -I just bit my tongue. -Toothless.
translation.ja: 舌かんじゃった 歯がないの

translation.en: It's so weird. It's true. It's so weird.
translation.ja: 変な人でしょ　本当よ

translation.en: I'm trying to save somebody here.
translation.ja: 私は人を救おうとしてる

translation.en: -Shh. -What, babe?
translation.ja: 何て？

translation.en: Don't jump.
translation.ja: 飛ばないで

translation.en: Don't jump.
translation.ja: そうじゃないの

translation.en: -What? -Don't jump.
translation.ja: 違う ダメよ

translation.en: Jump? I'm trying to light my cigarette. I just…
translation.ja: たばこに火をつけてた 火を…

translation.en: You guys--What?
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: -Seriously, you guys. -What?
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: -What? -Seriously, I think something really bad is gonna happen in the world.
translation.ja: 私は世の中に悪いことが起こると思ってる

translation.en: -But, no, I mean, like, worse than Y2K. -No.
translation.ja: 2000年問題よりも

translation.en: -Wow. -Worse than if George W. Bush wins.
translation.ja: ブッシュが大統領になるより悪い

translation.en: -Where are you getting this stuff? -Seriously.
translation.ja: 何それ 本気よ どうかしてる

translation.en: She's really cool.
translation.ja: でもクールね

translation.en: I think we're gonna be best friends. I do.
translation.ja: 私たち親友になれそう名前は？

translation.en: -What's your name again? -You don't remember my name?
translation.ja: 私たち親友になれそう名前は？ 覚えてないの？

translation.en: -Shaharzan. Shaharzan. -No.
translation.ja: シェヘラザード 違う

translation.en: -No? -It's Yasmin.
translation.ja: ヤスミンよ

translation.en: Come on. Let's get a drink. Come on.
translation.ja: ほら　こっちで飲もう

translation.en: Let's go. Come on.
translation.ja: さあ 行こう

translation.en: The 21st century warriors. Let's go!
translation.ja: 21世紀に向かって ほら 行くよ

translation.en: Yasmin?
translation.ja: ヤスミン？

translation.en: -[line clicks, beeps] -Yasmin?
translation.ja: ヤスミン

translation.en: Hi. This is Yasmin. Please leave a message.
translation.ja: ヤスミンです　伝言をどうぞ

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: まずい

translation.en: Gretchen, I really need you to watch Sebastian, okay?
translation.ja: グレッチェンセバスチャンを見てて

translation.en: Yeah, I already did 35 hours for this week, Anne. You know that.
translation.ja: アン今週は35時間 働いてる

translation.en: Yasmin needs me.
translation.ja: ヤスミンが大変なの

translation.en: How about I give you an extra $40 this week, okay?
translation.ja: 40ドル上乗せするから

translation.en: It's not just about the money, Anne.
translation.ja: お金の問題じゃないのアン

translation.en: It's about my quality of life.
translation.ja: 生活の質の問題

translation.en: Okay. 45.
translation.ja: 45ドルでどう？

translation.en: I'll give you 75. Okay?
translation.ja: 75ドルあげる いい？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay. Thank you so much.
translation.ja: いいよ ありがとう

translation.en: Appreciate it. Okay. Bye, sweetie.
translation.ja: 感謝する じゃあね

translation.en: Bye, Mommy.
translation.ja: バイバイ ママ

translation.en: [Jerry] I didn't do anything. I was just sitting there.
translation.ja: 僕は何もしてない

translation.en: Yeah, and--and her head fell in your lap and then it slipped in her mouth?
translation.ja: じゃあアレが彼女の口に自然と滑り込んだの？

translation.en: No. She deliberately gave me… a banana job. Ha.
translation.ja: 違う　彼女が意図的に僕のバナナをくわえた

translation.en: She was crying. She was lonely. She was drunk.
translation.ja: 彼女は泣いてて寂しがってて 酔ってた

translation.en: Even better. And then you paid her for it.
translation.ja: それであなたはお金を払った

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: I didn't pay her for a banana.
translation.ja: バナナの件で払ったんじゃない

translation.en: I gave her a check to help her out.
translation.ja: 助けるための小切手だ

translation.en: You know, Jerry, this is not a good moment in time for this.
translation.ja: ジェリータイミングがよくない

translation.en: People go to jail now.
translation.ja: 刑務所行きよ

translation.en: Justine. This is a struggle for me…
translation.ja: ジュスティーヌ僕だって悩んでる

translation.en: with my situation.
translation.ja: こんな状況だ

translation.en: I cried afterwards.
translation.ja: あとで泣いたよ

translation.en: This is--This is a disease, for Christ's sake.
translation.ja: これは病気なんだ

translation.en: I know, Jerry, but even a friend?
translation.ja: 分かるけど友達と？

translation.en: Especially friends. Yes. Even a friend. It's that bad.
translation.ja: 友達だからだ 友達でも難しい

translation.en: But I'm a friend.
translation.ja: 私も友達よ

translation.en: Yeah, but you're, you know-- uh, you have a beautiful family, you know.
translation.ja: そうだけど 君にはすばらしい家族がいる

translation.en: Okay, can we switch gears for a second?
translation.ja: 話題を変えないか？

translation.en: Let's--Let's, uh--
translation.ja: そうだな…

translation.en: Let's talk about the book. How's that coming along?
translation.ja: 本の話をしよう 進み具合は？

translation.en: It's, uh, going great.
translation.ja: 順調よ

translation.en: So all they're looking for is something French and charming with a little bit of you thrown in.
translation.ja: 求められてるのは君らしいフランス料理

translation.en: And if you want, Evan can take over the kitchen for a few days a week.
translation.ja: 必要なら エヴァンにキッチンを任せる

translation.en: Oh, no, he can't do that.
translation.ja: 彼には無理

translation.en: Yes, he can. Just until you finish the first draft.
translation.ja: 最初の草案ができるまで

translation.en: No. The restaurant will fall apart without me. -No, it won't. -Jerry, you--
translation.ja: ダメ　私がいないと店が回らない

translation.en: -No, it won't. No, it won't. -Jerry…
translation.ja: 回るよ ジェリー

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: Yeah. No.
translation.ja: いや ダメだ

translation.en: Because my acid reflux is kicking in. This conversation made me very nervous.
translation.ja: 胃酸が逆流し始めた今の話で不安になったんだ

translation.en: -About the book? -No, not about the book.
translation.ja: 本の話で？ 本じゃない

translation.en: Aren't you supposed to take only two?
translation.ja: ２錠だけでいいの？

translation.en: My doctor says I'm good for up to 30 a day.
translation.ja: １日30錠まで飲んでいいって

translation.en: Justine, as my friend, can--can you, uh, just keep your mouth shut about this?
translation.ja: 友達なら この件については口を閉ざしておいてくれ

translation.en: Yes, I think it's best we all keep our mouths shut around you.
translation.ja: あなたのそばでは口を開けないのが一番ね

translation.en: [laughs] That's funny.
translation.ja: 面白い

translation.en: Mm-hmm. Very.
translation.ja: すごくね

translation.en: [Jerry] Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. The kittens. Don't touch.
translation.ja: おい 僕の猫だぞ 触るなよ

translation.en: -[phone playing tune] -Don't ever do that again.
translation.ja: 二度とな

translation.en: [Justine] Hey, what's going on?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: Justine, will you meet me at the beach?
translation.ja: ジュスティーヌビーチに向かって

translation.en: Why?
translation.ja: 何で？

translation.en: Yasmin is going there, and she just sounds worse than usual.
translation.ja: ヤスミンが向かってる様子が変だったの

translation.en: You know, like very, very stressed.
translation.ja: 参ってるみたい

translation.en: -Really? -Oh, shit.
translation.ja: 本当？ ヤだ

translation.en: And now her phone's off.
translation.ja: 電話にも出ない

translation.en: But I'm at work.
translation.ja: でも仕事が…

translation.en: Your restaurant is five minutes from the beach. Come on.
translation.ja: ビーチは店から５分でしょ

translation.en: Okay, but how am I gonna find her?
translation.ja: でもどうやって捜すの？

translation.en: She'll probably be around the playground. Just look for her.
translation.ja: ビーチのどこかにいる 捜して

translation.en: Okay, I'll leave Albert at the restaurant and meet you there.
translation.ja: 息子を店に置いて向かう

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Hello.
translation.ja: もしもし？

translation.en: -[Anne] Hey, Ell, it's me. -Hi.
translation.ja: エル 私よヤスミンが危険なの

translation.en: -Yasmin is having a crisis. -What do you mean?
translation.ja: エル 私よヤスミンが危険なの 危険？

translation.en: She turned off her phone.
translation.ja: 電源がオフ

translation.en: Well, if she turned off her phone, she probably just wants to be alone.
translation.ja: １人になりたいからじゃない？

translation.en: She's going to the beach. Okay, we need to find her.
translation.ja: ビーチに向かった捜さないと

translation.en: -What? -Justine's already on her way over there.
translation.ja: ジュスティーヌが向かってる

translation.en: What do you mean, Justine's on her way over there?
translation.ja: どういうこと？

translation.en: She needs us, Ell. Come on.
translation.ja: 彼女 助けを求めてる

translation.en: Okay, okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Sarah, sweetheart, I need you to babysit your brothers.
translation.ja: サラ 弟の子守をよろしく

translation.en: I have an emergency.
translation.ja: 緊急なの

translation.en: -I don't need a babysitter. -Me neither!
translation.ja: 必要ない 僕も

translation.en: Yes, you do.
translation.ja: 必要よ

translation.en: You better pay me well.
translation.ja: お金はもらうよ

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: 本気？

translation.en: -[door closes] -Yeah!
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: Don't do anything stupid. I have no responsibility over you.
translation.ja: バカはやめてよ責任取れないから

translation.en: Oh, God. I've been looking everywhere for you.
translation.ja: よかったあちこち捜し回ったのよ

translation.en: -I'm sorry, honey. -Why didn't you pick up your phone?
translation.ja: ごめん 電話にも出ないし

translation.en: My battery died.
translation.ja: 電池切れで

translation.en: Thanks for coming to find me.
translation.ja: 捜しに来てくれてありがとう

translation.en: Of course.
translation.ja: 当然でしょ

translation.en: Anne, I'm so confused lately.
translation.ja: 最近 混乱してる

translation.en: I just--
translation.ja: ただ…

translation.en: I feel like…
translation.ja: 何ていうか…

translation.en: I made this decision to be with Will when I was 25,
translation.ja: ウィルと一緒になると決めたのは 25歳の時

translation.en: and now it's colored the entire rest of my life.
translation.ja: 私の人生はずっとその影響を受けてきた

translation.en: I mean, no pun intended. But I live in a completely white world.
translation.ja: ダジャレじゃないけど私は完全に白い世界にいる

translation.en: -No offense. -It's okay.
translation.ja: 悪気はない いいの

translation.en: But, you know, I'm Black. I'm Persian.
translation.ja: でも私はアフリカ系でイラン系

translation.en: I'm an out-of-work feminist
translation.ja: 無職のフェミニストで

translation.en: whose husband pays for her laser hair removal.
translation.ja: 脱毛代は夫に出してもらってる

translation.en: Who the fuck am I? You know.
translation.ja: 私って何者なの？

translation.en: You are a Black, Persian feminist who married a white guy
translation.ja: アフリカ系でイラン系のフェミニスト 白人の自閉症かもしれない人が夫

translation.en: who's possibly on the spectrum, and you are my best friend.
translation.ja: 白人の自閉症かもしれない人が夫 そして私の親友

translation.en: And you're mine.
translation.ja: あなたは私の親友

translation.en: But I gotta tell you, sometimes I don't call you, Anne, because you're high all the time.
translation.ja: でも 時々 電話しないのはあなたは いつもハイだから

translation.en: Call me before noon.
translation.ja: 午前中にかけて

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. You're so…
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: Wait. Are you high right now?
translation.ja: 今もハイ？

translation.en: No. [laughs]
translation.ja: いいえ

translation.en: -Anne. -The sun is going down.
translation.ja: アン 日が沈む

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.ja: もう

translation.en: She texted me "south of the police station."
translation.ja: 警察署の南って言われたけど

translation.en: Well, this whole beach is south of the police station.
translation.ja: ビーチ全体が警察署の南

translation.en: Oh, man.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: I'm kind of excited. I feel like I'm a superhero on a mission to rescue someone. You know?
translation.ja: 人を救うヒーローみたいで楽しい

translation.en: Can you imagine a movie, a superhero movie,
translation.ja: こんなヒーロー映画はどう？

translation.en: with the protagonist being this middle-aged woman?
translation.ja: 主人公が中高年の女性

translation.en: She puts on--At night, she puts on, like, a Lycra costume.
translation.ja: 夜 コスチュームに着替えるんだけど

translation.en: Spanx. With Spanx.
translation.ja: 補正下着なの

translation.en: And then she goes and rescues another middle-aged woman about to have a breakdown.
translation.ja: 救う相手も中高年の女性神経症のね

translation.en: Oh, my God. That could be a hit.
translation.ja: ヒットしそう

translation.en: [sighs] I have to go back in 20 minutes at the restaurant.
translation.ja: 20分で店に戻らないと

translation.en: I mean, if Martin finds out that I left Albert there by himself, I'm…
translation.ja: 20分で店に戻らないと 息子を置いてきたことがマルタンにバレたら…

translation.en: Why? He loves it there. All the pretty waitresses flirt with him.
translation.ja: 何で？アルベールなら平気よ

translation.en: Albert is like a fish in water at the restaurant.
translation.ja: みんなにも気に入られてる

translation.en: You know what? I spoke to Jerry,
translation.ja: ジェリーに聞いた

translation.en: and he told me that the check and the blow job are completely unrelated.
translation.ja: 小切手はフェラとは関係ないって

translation.en: So why did you make this up?
translation.ja: なぜ作り話を？

translation.en: I blew him because I'm lonely,
translation.ja: 寂しくてフェラした

translation.en: and he wrote me a check because I'm broke. So there you have it.
translation.ja: 彼が小切手をくれたのは私が文無しだから

translation.en: Well, yeah. Keep the "check for the blow job," you know, story.
translation.ja: フェラのお代ってことにしておこう

translation.en: It's much less depressing.
translation.ja: その方が気楽

translation.en: -Yeah. -Stick to that one.
translation.ja: ええ それがいい

translation.en: -My life's depress-- -Oh, it's them.
translation.ja: 人生は… いた

translation.en: -Where? -There!
translation.ja: どこ？ あそこ

translation.en: -Yeah. It's them. -What are they doing?
translation.ja: ２人よ 何を？

translation.en: Are they hugging? Are they making out? Ugh!
translation.ja: ハグ？ イチャついてる？

translation.en: -I'm so glad you're recovered. -Oh, my God! Hi!
translation.ja: 立ち直った？ 来てくれたんだ

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm fine.
translation.ja: 私は大丈夫

translation.en: You know how you have one of those days,
translation.ja: ツイてない日って

translation.en: and it just feels like everything is collapsing all around you?
translation.ja: 何もかもダメって思える

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, it's just fine again.
translation.ja: でも突然 平気になる

translation.en: Guys, do you love me?
translation.ja: 私のこと好き？

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: I mean, friends never ask friends, "Do you love me?"
translation.ja: 友達に 好きかどうか聞くことってないでしょ

translation.en: Okay, I just dropped my kids.
translation.ja: 私はあなたを捜すために子供を置いてきた

translation.en: I left them home alone to come and find you.
translation.ja: 私はあなたを捜すために子供を置いてきた 分かってる

translation.en: -I know. -We would drop everything to come and find you.
translation.ja: あなたを捜すためなら何だって投げ出す

translation.en: I think we might just have to prove it to her, girls.
translation.ja: それを証明してあげないとね

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -You ready?
translation.ja: いい？

translation.en: -No. -Yes.
translation.ja: ええ ダメ

translation.en: -No. -One, two, three!
-[Yasmin] Oh, my God! -[kissing]
translation.ja: イヤだ　ちょっとやめて

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？

translation.en: -You'll love me to death. -I thought we were gonna kill you.
translation.ja: 死ぬほど好き？ 殺すところだった まったく

translation.en: Did you like that?
translation.ja: よかった？

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: [Justine] Look at those birds all lined up.
translation.ja: 鳥が並んで飛んでる

translation.en: Every morning I hear them sing.
translation.ja: 毎朝 さえずりが聞こえる

translation.en: And really I believe that they believe
translation.ja: きっと鳥はこう思ってる

translation.en: that their song is making the sun rise.
translation.ja: さえずりで太陽を起こしてるんだって

translation.en: You know? It's like everything and everyone needs to find a purpose to their existence.
translation.ja: 誰もが 自分が存在する意義を求めてる

translation.en: Even if it's complete bullshit.
translation.ja: どんなに くだらなくてもね

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: I love that.
translation.ja: いい考え方

translation.en: Yeah. That's really beautiful.
translation.ja: すごく すてき

translation.en: [Anne] This is one of those perfect moments in life.
translation.ja: こういう時間が一番好き

translation.en: [Yasmine] Amazing.
translation.ja: 最高

translation.en: [Ell] Yeah. Look at it.
translation.ja: ええ　見て

translation.en: [Justine] Gorgeous.
translation.ja: すてき

translation.en: [in French] How are you, kiddo?
translation.ja: 〈調子は？〉

translation.en: Did you celebrate New Year's at school?
translation.ja: 〈学校で新年を祝ったのか？〉

translation.en: -[in French] Yes. -Did you eat the candy they gave you?
translation.ja: 〈うん〉 〈もらったお菓子は食べた？〉

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 〈ううん〉 〈そうか〉

translation.en: Mommy didn't… give you any candy? She didn't feed you candy?
translation.ja: 〈ママは お菓子を食べさせてないよな？〉

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 〈よし〉

translation.en: And how are you? Do you miss your mom? She's been working a lot lately.
translation.ja: 〈寂しくないか？〉 〈最近ママは忙しいから〉

translation.en: -No, I'm fine. -You're okay?
translation.ja: 〈大丈夫〉 〈そう？〉

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: 〈うん〉

translation.en: What is it? Satie?
translation.ja: 〈サティの曲？〉

translation.en: [Justine, in English] So if the hole, the nothing, is actually everywhere,
translation.ja: もし 穴がどこにでも開いてたら

translation.en: how do you manage not to fall into it?
translation.ja: 落ちないようにするには？

translation.en: That said, let's go back to our recipe.
translation.ja: レシピに話を戻そう

translation.en: Once the roast is cooked, you can start on the mushroom gravy
translation.ja: 肉が焼けたらグレイビーソース

translation.en: by adding a touch of soda water and Maizena.
translation.ja: 炭酸水とコーンフラワーを加える

translation.en: Don't forget to scrape the brown bits vigorously.
translation.ja: 焦げついた肉もこすり落とすこと

translation.en: The darker the bits, the more flavor it will give.
translation.ja: 焦げが濃いほど風味がよくなる
